summary: Giselda is a custom voiced destruction mage follower, she can be found in Four Shields Tavern in Dragonbridge
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#993333][size=3][u][b]Giselda - A Custom Voiced Follower[/b][/u][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ffffff][size=3][b]*Updated to V1.0.2 for follower fix*[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#ffffff][size=3][b]Giselda can be found in the Four Shields Tavern at Dragonbridge and is a destruction mage of the Nord Vampire persuasion.[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#ffffff][size=3][b]She isn't marriable yet as I still need to write dialogue for that part of the mod but I will hopefully have that done fairly soon.[/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][u][color=#993333][size=3][b]Required Mods.[/b][/size][/color][/u][/center]

[center][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?][color=#ffffff]Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0 by Azar[/color][/url][/b][/size]

[/center]
[center][u][color=#993333][size=3][b]Video.[/b][/size][/color][/u][/center]


[center][u][color=#993333][size=3][b]Thanks.[/b][/size][/color][/u][/center]
[center][color=#ffffff][size=3][b]Natalie Louise for providing me with the voices[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][color=#993333][size=3][b][u]My Other Mods.[/u][/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][b][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51506/?]The Balumont Sisters[/url][/u][/b][/center]
author: konnierizzle1
